import Link from "next/link"; import style from '../css/style.module.css' export default function OneSection(){ const menuOPCL = () => { const xc = document.getElementById("menu"); const bars = document.getElementById("bars"); if (xc.classList.contains("d-none")) { xc.classList.remove("d-none"); bars.classList.remove("fa", "fa-bars"); bars.classList.add("fas", "fa-times") } else { xc.classList.add("d-none"); bars.classList.add("fa", "fa-bars"); bars.classList.remove("fas", "fa-times") } } return (
